solution.text:
\( \frac{Number\, of\, words \,in\, hour}{Number \, of \, words\, in \, a \, minute} = 60 \)
Therefore Number of words in a minute = \( \frac{_{{6000*j}}_}{60} \)
\( \Rightarrow \) Number of words in a minute = _{{100*j}}_

content.text: The gross words a minute (GWAM) is defined as the number of words a person can type in one minute. Given that you are the fastest typist in the world and can type _{{6000*j}}_ words in one hour, what is your GWAM?
